title: How long does grey warwick take to unlock?
body: its been 24 hours since my 3rd friend just reached lvl 10 after reffering me but it still hasn't unlocked?

replies.body: thanks guys!!! its unlocked now, i would never have known otherwise haha
if you don't have it, your smurfs aren't high enough
you have to go to the refer-a-friend page to redeem it i think

http://rewards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/

go here, and it tells you. If it says you've unlocked it, it will take 12-24 hours. Usually.

Wait another day, if you don't have it, send in a support ticket.
